results.text: Your recent failure has really taken a toll on your confidence in your own abilities. You temporarily lose an expertise die to an Arcana skill specialty for the next 24 hours.
The information you are trying to interpret or recall remains out of reach. You have disadvantage on your next Arcana check.

Your arcane knowledge is alluding you for reasons unknown. Treat the target book, creature, or object as being under one of the effects of the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.fb72lq1m92o0d70a]{Arcanist's Magic Aura} (Narrator’s choice) for the next hour. This effect cannot be dispelled for the duration.
The arcane energies turn against you, temporarily warping your mind. You suffer the confused condition until the end of your next turn.
So many planes, so little memory space. You misattribute a special trait of one plane to another—with potentially disastrous results.
Your mind is so awash with facts, figures, and half-remembered passages that it’s overwhelming you. You gain a level of Strife.
